motivational.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivational.author: Steve Jobs

motivational.text: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
motivational.author: Robert Collier

motivational.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
motivational.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivational.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
motivational.author: C.S. Lewis

motivational.text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
motivational.author: William Butler Yeats

motivational.text: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
motivational.author: Nelson Mandela

motivational.text: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
motivational.author: Confucius

motivational.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
motivational.author: William James

motivational.text: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
motivational.author: Charles Kingsleigh

motivational.text: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
motivational.author: Brian Tracy

inspirational.text: Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
inspirational.author: Jim Rohn

inspirational.text: Health is not valued until sickness comes.
inspirational.author: Thomas Fuller

inspirational.text: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
inspirational.author: Christian D. Larson

inspirational.text: Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.
inspirational.author: Alice Morse Earle

inspirational.text: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
inspirational.author: Zig Ziglar

inspirational.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
inspirational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

inspirational.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
inspirational.author: Winston Churchill

inspirational.text: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
inspirational.author: Chris Grosser

inspirational.text: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
inspirational.author: Napoleon Hill

inspirational.text: Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
inspirational.author: Shiv Khera

life.text: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
life.author: Robert Urich

life.text: Happiness is the highest form of health.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.text: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.text: Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
life.author: Steve Jobs

life.text: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.text: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
life.author: Charles R. Swindoll

life.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
life.author: Lord Buddha

life.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
life.author: John Lennon

life.text: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
life.author: Plato

life.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
life.author: Confucius

success.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
success.author: Winston Churchill

success.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
success.author: Henry David Thoreau

success.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
success.author: Albert Schweitzer

success.text: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
success.author: John D. Rockefeller

success.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
success.author: Winston Churchill

success.text: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
success.author: Estée Lauder

success.text: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
success.author: George S. Patton

success.text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
success.author: Colin R. Davis

success.text: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don’t quit.
success.author: Conrad Hilton

success.text: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
success.author: Edward Everett Hale

happiness.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
happiness.author: Dalai Lama

happiness.text: For every minute you are angry, you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
happiness.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

happiness.text: Happiness is the secret to all beauty. There is no beauty without happiness.
happiness.author: Christian Dior

happiness.text: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters.
happiness.author: Audrey Hepburn

happiness.text: Happiness is not in the mere possession of money; it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
happiness.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

happiness.text: Happiness is a state of mind. It’s just according to the way you look at things.
happiness.author: Walt Disney

happiness.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
happiness.author: Dalai Lama

happiness.text: Happiness consists more in small conveniences or pleasures that occur every day, than in great pieces of good fortune that happen but seldom.
happiness.author: Benjamin Franklin

happiness.text: Happiness is a journey, not a destination.
happiness.author: Douglas William Jerrold

happiness.text: If you want happiness for an hour, take a nap. If you want happiness for a day, go fishing. If you want happiness for a year, inherit a fortune. If you want happiness for a lifetime, help someone else.
happiness.author: Chinese Proverb
